name: Head Space (RedTheDemonCat)
description:
Hello!

Plants are what you want to keep growing and watering to keep your health up and weeds are little buggers that should be removed because they drain your health (like, toxic people). But weeds take a lot of clicks to remove.

Suggested Screen Resolution: 800 x 600 or 1400 x 1050

This game was created for the Serious Game Train jam. The idea is that Your environment is your mental state. You should take good care of yours and those of people close to you. However it is not easy to do just that. Toxic people stick close and drain you of your happiness.

The game idea expanded onto having bridges that linked to other people's mental states that you would spend time labouring; only to end up neglecting your own if not managed at the PERFECT pace.

The current version is a very basic prototype. Thank you for your time.

This game was developed in a team: Saili Chola, Siya and Dhannya Mathew
